Components/Base-Components/audio-bubble.title: Audio Bubble
Components/Base-Components/audio-bubble.description: CometChatAudioBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is an audio.

Components/Base-Components/Avatar.title: Avatar
Components/Base-Components/Avatar.description: The CometChatAvatar component displays user and group avatars. For users and groups , it displays either an image or the user's avatar and falls back to the first two letters of the username.

Components/Base-Components/badge.title: Badge
Components/Base-Components/badge.description: The CometChatBadge component displays the unread count of messages for one-to-one private and group chats.

Components/Base-Components/date.title: Date
Components/Base-Components/date.description: CometChatDate is a UILabel which is used to show the date and time. It provides various methods to customize the appearance and behavior of the CometChatDate.

Components/Base-Components/file-bubble.title: File Bubble
Components/Base-Components/file-bubble.description: CometChatFileBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is an file.

Components/Base-Components/image-bubble.title: Image Bubble
Components/Base-Components/image-bubble.description: CometChatImageBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is an image.

Components/Base-Components/list-base.title: List Base
Components/Base-Components/list-base.description: CometChatListBase is a container component having title (navigationBar), search (search-bar), background, and a container to embed a list view, such as CometChatConversationList, CometChatGroupList, CometChatUserList,CometChatCallList.

Components/Base-Components/list-item.title: List Item
Components/Base-Components/list-item.description: CometChatListItem contains one to three lines of text optionally flanked by icons or other views, such as CometChatAvatar, CometChatDate or Text. CometChatAvatar will always be shown in the leading view therefore either one among the avatarURL or avatarName must be provided. The icons (or other widgets) for the list item are defined with the tailView parameter. The first line of text is optional and is specified with title. The value of subtitle is also optional, will occupy the space allocated for an additional line of text or some other view.

Components/Base-Components/media-recorde.title: Media Recorder
Components/Base-Components/media-recorde.description: CometChatMediaRecorder is a class that allows users to record and send audio messages. It has a start button to start recording, a stop button to stop recording, a play button to play the recorded message, a pause button to pause the recorded message, a submit button to submit the recorded message and a close button to close the media recorder.

Components/Base-Components/messsage-inpu.title: Message Input
Components/Base-Components/messsage-inpu.description: CometChatMessageInput is a component that provides a skeleton layout for contents of like TextField, auxiliary options, primary button view and attachment options.

Components/Base-Components/receipt.title: Receipt
Components/Base-Components/receipt.description: This component is of class UIImageView and is customizable to display CometChatReceipt.

Components/Base-Components/status-indica.title: Status Indicator
Components/Base-Components/status-indica.description: This component is of the class UImageView. It's customisable to display the status of the user's presence as online, offline using colour codes or can be used to display type of a group as password protected, public or private using a custom image.

Components/Base-Components/text-bubble.title: Text Bubble
Components/Base-Components/text-bubble.description: CometChatTextBubble is the content view shown for TextMessage.

Components/Base-Components/video-bubble.title: Video Bubble
Components/Base-Components/video-bubble.description: CometChatVideoBubble is the content view for a MediaMessage if the media sent is a video.

Components/Components Overview.title: Overview
Components/Components Overview.description: CometChat's UI Kit is a set of pre-built UI components that allows you to easily craft an in-app chat with all the essential messaging features.

Components/Conversations/Contacts.title: Contacts
Components/Conversations/Contacts.description: CometChatContacts is a UIViewController specifically designed to facilitate the display and management of users and groups within chat applications. It streamlines the process of showcasing all app users and available chat groups in a user-friendly interface, making it easier for users to connect and communicate effectively. Additionally, the view controller includes a UISegmentedControl to switch between the users and groups list, enhancing navigation and usability.

Components/Interactive Messages/action-e.title: Action Entity
Components/Interactive Messages/action-e.description: Base class for defining the type of actions that can be performed on BaseInteractiveElement

Components/Interactive Messages/button-e.title: Button Element
Components/Interactive Messages/button-e.description: The ButtonElement class, inherited from the BaseInteractiveElement class, represents an interactive button element that can be added to a chat interface. It comprises of properties like button text and a flag indicating whether the button should be disabled after interaction.

Components/Interactive Messages/card-bub.title: Card Bubble
Components/Interactive Messages/card-bub.description: The CometChatCardBubble component is used to display a card within a chat bubble. The card includes an image, text, and action buttons. It helps to offer action-oriented chat experiences, like booking a flight, ordering food, scheduling a meeting, etc., directly in the chat.

Components/Interactive Messages/card-mes.title: Card Message
Components/Interactive Messages/card-mes.description: The CardMessage class is used to create a card message for CometChat. It extends the InteractiveMessage class from CometChat.

Components/Interactive Messages/check-bo.title: Check Box Element
Components/Interactive Messages/check-bo.description: The CheckboxElement class is utilised to create a single selection input element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/date-tim.title: Date Time Picker Element
Components/Interactive Messages/date-tim.description: DateTimeElement is used to represent a single input field that allows to select date and time.

Components/Interactive Messages/dropdown.title: DropDown Element
Components/Interactive Messages/dropdown.description: The DropDownElement class is utilised to create a single selection input element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/element-.title: Element Entity
Components/Interactive Messages/element-.description: This is the base class for every element possible in the Interactive message component, defined by cometchat

Components/Interactive Messages/form-bub.title: Form Bubble
Components/Interactive Messages/form-bub.description: The CometChatFormBubble component is used to render a form within a chat bubble. The form fields are dynamically built based on the data passed in the message prop. The form fields can include text inputs, checkboxes, radio buttons, dropdown, labels, single selects, buttons. Once the form is filled out and submitted, the data will be sent to the provided URL or handled by a custom function.

Components/Interactive Messages/form-mes.title: Form Message
Components/Interactive Messages/form-mes.description: The FormMessage class is used to create an interactive form message that can be sent via CometChat. It extends the InteractiveMessage class from CometChat.

Components/Interactive Messages/label-el.title: Label Element
Components/Interactive Messages/label-el.description: The LabelElement class enables the creation of a label element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/radio-bu.title: Radio Button Element
Components/Interactive Messages/radio-bu.description: The RadioButtonElement class is utilised to create a single selection input element in a user interface.

Components/Interactive Messages/schedule.title: Scheduler Bubble
Components/Interactive Messages/schedule.description: CometChatSchedulerBubble is a versatile type of message widget designed to facilitate easy and efficient event scheduling. It offers the following key features:

Components/Interactive Messages/schedule.title: Scheduler Message
Components/Interactive Messages/schedule.description: The SchedulerMessage class is used to create an interactive scheduler message that can be sent via CometChat. It extends the Interactive Interactive Messages class from CometChat.

Components/Interactive Messages/textinpu.title: TextInput Element
Components/Interactive Messages/textinpu.description: The TextInputElement class is used to create a text input element in a user interface.

Components/Messages/Message Information.title: Message Information
Components/Messages/Message Information.description: The MessageInformation is a Component designed to display message-related information, such as delivery and read receipts. It serves as an integral part of the CometChat UI Kit, extending the ListBase class, which provides the underlying infrastructure for CometChat UI components. With its rich set of methods and properties, developers can easily customize and tailor the appearance and behavior of the message information view to suit the specific requirements of their application.

Guides/CometChat UI.title: Multi-Tab Chat UI Guide
Guides/CometChat UI.description: How to add Tabbed layout for Chat,Users,Groups and Call modules?

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: CometChat's UI Kit for iOS Swift simplifies the development of chat applications by providing a comprehensive set of customizable UI components. These components are organized into modules, allowing for easy integration and adaptation to match the specific requirements of your app. With this UI Kit, you can effortlessly incorporate essential messaging features while tailoring the interface to align with your application's unique style and functionality.
